description_html:
Publisher: Dungeon Masters Guild

A Four-Hour Spelljammer Dungeoncraft Adventure for Level 5-10 Characters. Optimized for Average Party Level (APL) 8.

In the swampy planet of Lepo Gors, a pair of brothers has disappeared into the mysterious forest outside the settlement of Tarasa, and everyone sent to find them has not returned. Will you be able to find them or will you be spirited away as well?

CONTENT WARNINGS: Animal and Child Endangerment, Body Horror, Death, Dismemberment, Excrement, Kidnapping, Rocks, Slight Gore, Torture

Several elements of this adventure, primarily the creatures featured, are inspired by Philippine mythological creatures.  

WHAT'S INSIDE:

  • A 32-page easy to read PDF that includes:
    • 9 pages of the core adventure
    • 11 pieces of artwork to bring the adventure to life
    • Stat blocks for NPCs and Monsters
    • Guidance to adjust encounter difficulty
  • A downloadable zip of High Quality maps for easy printing and virtual tabletop use
  • A downloadable zip file of the artwork and handouts

Pillars of Play Composition:

Social - 30%

Exploration - 20% 

Combat - 50%

Price: $4.99
title: The Light and the Lost
